p: E. coli DH10ß competent bacteria (Invitrogen, CA, USA) were transformed with pMP-H1/RBD according to manufacturer’s instructions as described above with 20 ng of pMP-H1/RBD plasmid. Individual colonies from ampicillin containing LB Agar plate were picked and incubated in 5 mL liquid LB for 16 h. These cultures were then used to inoculate the large-volume cultures in the next step.
